title: Kirchhoff junction - 4 ammeters in circuit portion

content.question: The figure shows a portion of an electric circuit. The four ammeters indicate the magnitude, but not the direction, of the current at different locations. What is the magnitude of the current <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>I</mi></math> in the middle horizontal segment of wire?

choices.label: <math alttext="1 ampere" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>
<math alttext="3 amperes" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>
<math alttext="5 amperes" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>
<math alttext="7 amperes" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>7</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1 ampere" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
